website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix S630 puts a little extra zoom in your pocket, but you might not find the high-resolution photos it shoots out pleasurable.
pros: 7x optical zoom in a compact body
good photo quality up to ISO 400

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Sure its an older Nikon but its a Nikon with all the good features they bring. Daylight photos are excellent. Low light photos not so much (as is the case with all small sensors of this generation of camera). 7X optical zoom provides good focal length range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited to find a Coolpix S630 in such great shape!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to find this S630. I have one that I bought years and years ago, which now has tape holding the battery compartment closed, but for a small point and shoot, I love this model, and was thrilled to know I could own another for when that solution wasn't effective any longer. This one was delivered to me packaged perfectly, and the camera is in great shape, performing perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie StPierre

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second Coolpix 630. My first one was stolen. I immediately ordered another one because dollar for dollar no other camera can produce the results I got from this small and handy powerhouse. The zoom is great at 7X optical, and 12 megapixel gives me all the resolution any normal user will ever need. Easy to use features, including an "auto" that does all the work for you. I can even make movies. I studied long and hard before I bought and my research paid off handsomely. I strongly recommend this product. My only suggestion is to spend the $40 for a 150X memory card for ultra-fast operation between shots.
customer_reviews.author: H. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and in good condition. Picture quality is good but the battery life not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Caribbean Woman

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this camera for about a month now, but I really like it. I especially like the anti-vibration and facial recognition features. You can really tell the difference in the auto-focus when these features are enable. The only con I see with this camera is the awkward position of the screen and buttons. I have not found a way to comfortably take pictures with one hand. I have to hold the camera by the top and bottom edges. I would have to get fingerprints all over the screen to hold it with one hand. However, I expect this from a such a compact camera. More room would mean a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: sin257

customer_reviews.title: Great, but purchase battery charger separately
customer_reviews.text: Per my 11year old end user :Amazing graphics and zoom, but need to purchase battery charger separately.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: Concerns with the packaged offering
customer_reviews.text: There is an error in the "packaged offering" with the Nikon and the extra battery. This is what is stated: Best Value Buy Nikon Coolpix S630 12MP Digital Camera with 7x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Jet Black) and get Targus Digital TGB-ENEL10 LION Replacement Battery for Nikon ENEL10 at an additional 25% off Amazon.com's everyday low price. + Buy Together Today: To see our price, add these items to your cart. Why don't we show the price? This is the wrong battery for this camera. It should be the ENEL12! The camera is outstanding!!! It is just an error in the grouping that is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Battery was shot and required replacing. More than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery was shot and required replacing. More than the camera. There were no instructions but was able to find online
customer_reviews.author: Keith Loucks

customer_reviews.title: Great cam for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the pics, still a little blurry/grainy at full resolutions but sized down they look great. It's a touch to big to be a real pocket cam, it's about the size of two blackberry phones stacked on top of each other. Highly recommend some sort of screen protector for the screen. It's fast and responsive, A LOT of scene options.
customer_reviews.author: Rowen Matthew Gunn

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: On my way home from work a month ago, I pulled off the road and hiked for a few hours my second hour in to my hike. I came across two Red Fox pups. I took over 30 pictures and and video maybe an hour and a half worth. Unfortionatly I didnt have my tripod with me so most of the pictures I took are a little blury. On that hike I crossed at least to sreams on downed tree's. The camera being light and not bulky helps plus if I dropped it in either one of the streams I would only been out $300.00 instead of dropping the expensive nikon d5000.
customer_reviews.author: E. ROWNEY

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA, GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Positive: The camera provides excellent features, 12 mpxls, and a fast shudder release. Easy to use and light to carry. Negative: Battery life is mediocre and I recommend a back up battery. The software for downloading, editing, etc. on a computer is fair. You need a better software program. HP has an excellent program, but it appears to be incompatible with Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S. Pickard

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for my teenager
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for my teenager. Many settings, good zoom, small and easy to carry around, easy to use, and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera for price & size
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very impressed with this camera. It has a good solid feel and is comfortable to hold. To me it is VERY fast to start up and take pictures. I"m only just learning all the features, there a TONS! I"m very pleased with this NIkon S630 and already feel it is WELL worth the approx $200 price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyne L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use small size. just right for my basic pictures.
customer_reviews.author: m.raven

customer_reviews.title: A good replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a coolpix elf . It a gift and the new owner of this camera loves it , The size is a little bigger than the elf but the performance far out weighs that
customer_reviews.author: ishant44

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality... but....
customer_reviews.text: 7x Zoom is nice, but I really wish P&S cameras had better zoom that didn't distort. This was a gift for the girlfriend, she gives it a 5 of 5, but she's being nice i guess (since i bought it for her). Here's what she has told me about it: Great for: The Zoo, concerts (only if you're on the rail), Home and pets, Gardens, detailed close ups, easy to use, big display for photo review. Not so great for: When you're pretty far from something, dark-photo quality (night time, clubs, etc), presets are stupid sometimes. Guess she's gonna get a SLR for X-mas, better start saving up! Great P&S camera hands down, just needs a bit more zoom =/
customer_reviews.author: Devan Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, and affordable price. Easy to inadvertantly switch off flash. Pay attention so you can tell if it happens. Camera shoots in low light, without flash.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kreiman

customer_reviews.title: It Took Blurry Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I gave this camera to my 27 year old daughter for Christmas as she wanted a zoom which was 7x optical. She started using it and the pictures were coming out blurry. She went online to a camera bulletin board and found out that other owners had the same problem with it. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Swisher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for travel so I would not have to carry my Nikon D70. The pictures have the same expected quality as from my SLR camera. The zoom control is not as flexible as I would like. It seems to want to go from one extreme to the other rather than slowly letting you choose the power of zoom. Other than that it is extremely nice to carry, fits easily in my jeans pocket or my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Feet

customer_reviews.title: Feedback
customer_reviews.text: In very good condition. The camera itself is good in terms of convenience and functionality. Here we go - good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Strayer University Book Seller

customer_reviews.title: nikon? i got a dud.
customer_reviews.text: i selected the highest quality setting, 4000*, yet the pictures were grainy, of probably a 2 mega quality. my optio 4 mega camera did much better. the colors, even in vivid mode, are washed out. very, very, disappointed in this nikon product.
customer_reviews.author: osmond

customer_reviews.title: Nikon
customer_reviews.text: The camera is good for easy use; it's compact for easy carrying; and takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: GIE

customer_reviews.title: coolpix s630
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera with very good picture quality--surprised that it comes with only enough memory for 14 pictures. You must purchase memory cards separately but with only the 4gb card you get over a thousand pictures in memory and you can purchase up to a 16gb one if you wish. The zoom is very strong and works best if used outside.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Valerius

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good basic camera, bought it refurbished, so there was NO memory card or case which was very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kat_F

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Camera is simple to use both for stills and video and produces sharp images. A good gift for someone wanting to take family photos without mastering the ins and outs of more complex digital slrs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Negri

customer_reviews.title: Great compact camera
customer_reviews.text: This Nikon compact works great and has wonderful battery life. The video quality is surprising good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Just loving the new Nikon Coolpix S630. Great picture quality. So easy to use when you first get it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Reyes

customer_reviews.title: coolpix s630
customer_reviews.text: the camera does not work! I have tried everything to get it to work but it turns on but doesn't take pictures
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I received my camera 3 days ago, and so far so good! The size and look of the camera is awesome, very sleek and perfect to toss in my purse to have at ALL times. The picture quality so far has been outstanding, especialy outdoors. Great camera for normal everyday use. The retouch option works really well, and overall is very easy to figure out! So far my only complaint would be that on the continuous mode it is a little hard to keep the camera still enough to take quality pictures so close together. That could possibly be user error though....
customer_reviews.author: D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great Pix for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great things about CoolPix: + Long-lasting battery + Clear, High Quality pictures + Adjusts to almost any conditions + Design and color very stylish + Well made + Light weight Other notes: + Little zooming while taking a video, I think it should be possible to zoom more + It takes a little bit too long to snap a photo + Zoom can be difficult to control Accessories to buy: + SD card + Case + Lens Protector + Extra battery I am very pleased with this camera, especially because you get a good product for a good price. It is very well designed, and it fits everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: R. Song

customer_reviews.title: Blurry Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera for about 3 weeks, took in on vacation to NY City. About 1/4 of the pictures came out very blurry. We were a bit disappointed. We were careful to allow it to properly focus but still some pictures were just not good. The camera looks and feels great though! So we returned it for a slightly more expensive, more bulky Canon SX200IS. The Canon has yet to take a bad picture so it wasn't user error with the Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Nikon camera I have had, and like the others I was not disappointed. The camera takes great pictures, even when zoomed out. The only fault I find with the camera is that the zoom button is too touchy. The menu is easy to navigate and gives you lots of ways to personalize your picture taking. Unlike some cameras this camera even takes great night photos, even when hand held. Would highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Snotme

customer_reviews.title: Nikon CoolPix-Jetblack Digital Camera, Versatile and Small,Cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this little Black Nikon Coolpix @ best buy for $100something+ ..under $200. Not bad, can take moving shots of a Car, sometimes though it's pain to find the right adjustment so you won't get a gloomy pic. has cool features, a definite upgrade over my 6year old but still working big Sony Cybershot(was considered small then!) which kills batteries very fast, this one doesn't need batteries, has it's own Nikon Battery you could charge.
customer_reviews.author: José López

customer_reviews.title: lousy durability
customer_reviews.text: The LCD cracked on the inside while the camera was in my briefcase with my net book and Blackberry, neither of which show any ill effects. There was no abuse or mishandling what so ever. Nikon will not replace the LCD under warranty. If this camera had reasonable durability it would be worth the $200 I initially paid for it, but as it failed under gentle handling and its true cost is now over $300, I advise that no one purchase this camera---or for that matter purchase anything from Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: DrSam

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera it has suited my needs as a beginner photographer for a while now. Has great modes on it, including my favorite macro mode, here is a picture I took with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I would love a little more zoom but overall this camera is great. The pictures come out beautifully clear and it captures the colors brilliantly. I had been using a very old, very worn out camera before so this is a breath of fresh air! Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix S630
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little point-and-shoot camera. With 12 megapixel resolution and 7x optical zoom, its a versatile device with a large display. There are a number of different features: camera mode, numerous scene modes, and movie mode. Fits in a shirt pocket, so its easy to carry. Nikon quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Gray

customer_reviews.title: A Nikon in name only
customer_reviews.text: A short review of the s630. Don't buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix S630 12MP Digital Camera with 7x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Jet Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Jet BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER


Nikon’s pocket-sized Coolpix S630 combines 12.0 effective megapixels with an amazing 7x optical Zoom-Nikkor glass lens for stunning prints as large as 16x20 inches. The sleek, new smart grip design makes it easy to carry, and the incredible, bright 2.7-inch LCD makes it easy to compose and share pictures. The Coolpix S630, with Nikon’s EXPEED image processor and new 4 Way VR Image Stabilization, makes incredible pictures incredibly easy. The Coolpix S630 also features Nikon’s New Smart Portrait System, which automatically detects your subjects face, takes a picture when they smile and warns you if they blinked. 

Coolpix S630 Highlights 

12.0-megapixel resolution for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches 

7x optical Zoom-Nikkor (37-260mm) glass lens provides exceptional pictures and gets you close to the action 

New EXPEED image processor ensures high-quality pictures with stunning color and sharpness 

4-Way VR Image stabilization

 * Nikon’s Optical VR image stabilization compensates for the effects of camera shake by moving the image sensor 
 * Motion Detection automatically detects moving subjects and adjusts shutter speed and the ISO setting to compensate for cameras hake and subject movement 
 * High ISO up to 3200 capability helps give you sharper results when shooting in low light or capturing fast-moving subjects. ISO 3200 is available at 3MP or lower resolution 
 * Nikon’s original Best Shot Selector (BSS) automatically takes up to 10 shots while the shutter is pressed and saves the sharpest image 

Bright 2.7-inch high-resolution LCD enables easy access to all the camera controls without the conventional buttons to push. The anti-reflection coating that is applied to the LCD enhances viewing even in bright light 

Scene Auto Selector automatically recognizes the scene in your picture and adjusts camera setting 

New Sports Continuous Scene Mode for shooting at up to 10fps when you set the resolution to 3MP or lower 

Nikon’s Smart Portrait System:  * In-Camera Red-Eye Fix automatically fixes most instances of red-eye in the camera. You may never see red-eye again 
 * Enhanced Face-Priority AF - Nikon’s face-finding technology that automatically focuses on up to 12 faces 
 * Smile Mode automatically releases the shutter when your subject smiles 
 * NEW Blink Proof enables the camera to take two pictures when the subject smiles and saves the shot in which the subject’s eyes are open 

What's in the Box
Li-ion rechargeable battery EN-EL12, Battery Charger MH-65, USB Cable UC-E6, Audio/Video Cable EG-CP14, Strap AN-CP19, Software Suite for Coolpix CD-ROM
feature_bullets: 12.0-megapixel resolution for photo-quality prints up to 16 x 20 inches
7x optical Zoom-Nikkor (37-260mm) glass lens; 4-way VR image stabilization
2.7-inch high-resolution LCD screen; Scene Auto Selector
Nikon's Smart Portrait System; Red-eye Fix, Face Priority AE and more
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars64 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
